1.1.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-easy-feed
1.1.0.description:
The Wordpress Easy Feed plugin allows you to easily include items from your favourite RSS feeds. Some social media/networking defaults do exist (The list will expand in the future), but the option to make use of a custom feed URL is available. There are also some basic styling options available.

Current Social Media/Networking Presets:

  • Twitter
  • Delicious
  • StumbleUpon
  • Digg
  • reddit
  • Technorati
  • YouTube
